name: Discworld
content:
game:
  game_id: tinsel
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      find "$src" -type f \( -name "*.IDX" -o -name "*.GRA" -o -name "*.SCN" -o -name
      "*.SMP" -o -name "*.TXT" -o -name "FAT.OPL" -o -name "MIDI.DAT"  -o -name "INDEX"
      -o -name "SAMPLE.AD" -o -name "SAMPLE.OPL" \) -exec cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc
    requires: DWU.EXE
- execute:
    args: $DISC/ $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
